Thanks for the link. We can only hope the series will be resumed sometime in 
the future. -sob- And I wanted to see PMK Hijikata with short hair and a 
western suit! They could at least try to console us with releasing the first 
PeaceMaker stories here...

This is actually why I hate anything that comes in a series. It ALWAYS seems 
to stop without actually finishing the story.

-MissB
